mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS EXISTING_CNT FROM CHTT_MBR CM1 INNER JOIN CHTT_MBR CM2 ON CM1.CHTT_ROOM_NO = CM2.CHTT_ROOM_NO INNER JOIN CHTT_ROOM CR ON CM1.CHTT_ROOM_NO = CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO WHERE CM1.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID = #{emplId1} AND CM2.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID = #{emplId2} AND CR.CHTT_ROOM_TY = '0'

SELECT CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO, CR.CHTT_ROOM_NM, CR.CHTT_ROOM_TY, CASE WHEN CR.CHTT_ROOM_TY = 0 THEN ( SELECT UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM FROM EMPL E JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON E.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE E.EMPL_ID = ( SELECT CM.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID FROM CHTT_MBR CM WHERE CM.CHTT_ROOM_NO = CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO AND CM.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID != #{emplId} ) ) ELSE 'ThumbnailForMultiChatRoom.png' END AS CHTT_ROOM_THUMBNAIL, COALESCE(C.CHTT_CN, '(채팅 내역이 없습니다)') AS LATEST_CHTT_CN, COALESCE(C.CHTT_INPUT_DATE, CR.CHTT_ROOM_CREAT_DE) AS LATEST_INPUT_DATE FROM CHTT_ROOM CR LEFT JOIN ( SELECT C1.CHTT_ROOM_NO, C1.CHTT_CN, C1.CHTT_INPUT_DATE FROM CHTT C1 WHERE C1.CHTT_INPUT_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(C2.CHTT_INPUT_DATE) FROM CHTT C2 WHERE C2.CHTT_ROOM_NO = C1.CHTT_ROOM_NO ) ) C ON CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO = C.CHTT_ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN CHTT_MBR CM ON CM.CHTT_ROOM_NO = CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO WHERE CM.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID = #{emplId} OR CM.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID IS NULL ORDER BY LATEST_INPUT_DATE DESC

SELECT E.EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM, (SELECT C.COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON C WHERE C.COMMON_CODE = E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT) AS DEPT_NM, (SELECT C.COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON C WHERE C.COMMON_CODE = E.COMMON_CODE_CLSF) AS CLSF_NM, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS PROFILE_FILE_NAME FROM EMPL E JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON E.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE E.EMPL_ID != #{emplId}

SELECT C.CHTT_NO, C.CHTT_ROOM_NO, C.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM AS CHTT_MBR_EMPL_NM, C.CHTT_CN, C.CHTT_INPUT_DATE FROM CHTT C JOIN EMPL E ON C.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID WHERE C.CHTT_ROOM_NO = #{chttRoomNo} ORDER BY CHTT_INPUT_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHTT (CHTT_NO, CHTT_ROOM_NO, CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID, CHTT_CN, CHTT_INPUT_DATE) VALUES (CHTT_SEQ.nextval, #{chttRoomNo}, #{chttMbrEmplId}, #{chttCn}, #{chttInputDate})
